fulltext:
Hanh Vo 
Senior Mobile Developer  
I have about 8 years of experience with iOS Android and Windows Phone 
platform. I can work well in team or independently. I really want to make 
great mobile apps and challenge myself with difficult problems. I believe 
that we can do anything if we really want. I love the adventurous feeling 
when playing with some interesting technology. I want to find an attractive 
company to work and satisfy my programming passion.  
TECHNICAL SKILLS  
•Development Platform: iOS, Android, Windows Phone. 
•Programming Languages: Swift, Objective-C, Java, C#, C++, Python 
•Development Tools: Xcode, Android Studio, Microsoft Visual Studio, 
Microsoft  Expression Blend, SourceTree, Slack, Trello, Jira. 
•Database Management Systems: MySQL, SQLite. 
•Operating Systems: Mac OS X, iOS, Android, Windows Phone 
•Foreign Languages: English. 
EDUCATION 
•University of Sciences – BS in Software Engineering. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
•iOS 
•Android 
•WindowPhone 
GITHUB  https://github.com/alda07 
HACKERANK   https://www.hackerrank.com/alda_vo?hr_r=1 
hanh.vo.programmer@gmail.com
(+84)938087598
ACHIEVEMENTS 
I. Impression Projects 
1. Copilot (IPAD)  
•Description: DirectTV is an American direct broadcast satellite service 
provider and broadcaster . As of July 2015, it is a subsidiary of AT&T. It 
supplies solution for the entertainment service. COPILOT is 
application to watch TV on IPAD.  
•Team Size: 10  
•Responsibilities:  
-Research solution  
-Maintenance and upgrade new features.  
-Functional, Omniture and Crashlytics bugs fix.  
-Support team to handle issues.  
-Tools and Technologies: Objective-C, Xcode, Crashlytic, Omniture, 
Json, Jira,SVN.  
•Reference: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/directv-app-for-ipad/ 
id421547368?mt=8  
•For company: Contractor developer for AT&T (FPT client) 
2. VoiceMap  
•Description: VoiceMap’s audio walks, cycles and drives are produced 
by insightful local storytellers, including journalists, podcasters, 
filmmakers, novelists, and tour guides. In 2015, VoiceMap become top 
one traveling application in South Africa. 
•Team Size: 1 
•Responsibilities:  
-Research solution.  
-Development features.  
-Fixing bugs. 
•Tools and Technologies: Objective-C, Xcode, JSON, Restful API, 
Mapbox, Audio handling, Github, AFNetworking. 
•Reference: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/voicemap-city-tours/ 
id852027939?mt=8   
•For company: SUGAR VENTURES. 
II. Achievements at SUGAR :  http://www.sugar.sg/ 
1.MeetDrinks  
•Description:  
MeetDrinks is a social meet-up application that brings people 
closer together over a mutual appreciation for bespoke drinks and 
elegant conversations. Simply put, our app matches compatible 
urbanites in the same area to meet for drinks. Unlike other dating 
apps, by removing the chat and focusing on people meeting up, 
MeetDrinks bridges digital socializing with the real world of dating.  
•Responsibilities:  
-Research solution.  
-Development features.  
-Fix bugs 
•Team Size: 1. 
•Tools and Technologies: Swift, Xcode, JSON, Rest API, Github, 
AFNetworking, Web socket. 
•Reference: https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/meetdrinks-hẹn-hò-
đúng-ng ườ i/id1227336799?mt=8  
2. Dropfoods 
•Description:  
Dropfoods is the premiere vending machine chain in Vietnam 
started by Singapore's successful venture builder, Sugar Ventures. 
Dropfoods app is an application to make from simply purchasing 
your favorite snacks to paying bills at our Dropfoods vending 
machines a whole lot easier. 
•Responsibilities:  
-Research solution.  
-Development features.  
-Fix bugs. 
•Team Size: 1. 
•Tools and Technologies: Java, Android Studio, JSON, Rest API, 
Github. 
•Reference: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?
id=sugar.dropfood 
III. At SYNOVA (http://www.synova-solutions.com)
1.Camera Plugin for PhoneGap 
•Description:  
Writing a plugin makes a bridge to connect between Objective C 
and PhoneGap.  
•Team Size: 1 . 
•Responsibilities:  
-Research solution.  
-Development features. 
-Create library for frontend team. 
•Tools and Technologies: Objective-C, Xcode, Javascript, Phonegap, 
SVN.  
•Reference: http://www.easyrecrue.com/?lc=en_GB  
2. Pressing Box 
•Description: This application is laundry service for French customer. 
•Team Size: 2. 
•Responsibilities:  
-Research solution.  
-Structure application and define web service.  
-Development features.  
-Support team to handle issues or hard technical points. 
•Tools and Technologies: Objective-C, Xcode, JSON, SVN 
•Reference: https://itunes.apple.com/au/artist/pressing-box/
id965722693  
IV. At FPT (https://www.fpt-software.com) 
Research projects (Internal Project)  
❖ Core Bluetooth plugin for Hybrid application using HTML5 and 
PhoneGap technology.  
•Description: This is plugin use as the bridge connecting between the 
native IOS code and PhoneGap project.  
•Team Size: 1.  
•Responsibilities: Research solution and implementation core 
Bluetooth library. 
❖  MQTT Messenger (iOS)  
•Description: This is an iOS application using MQTT protocol to transfer 
message. The messenger app allow user to send text message, picture 
or voice message with a lot of cool emoticon. This project receive  good 
feedback from DirectTV USA. 
•Team Size: 3. 
•Responsibilities:  
-Research solution.  
-Design system, implementation features.  
-Support team to handle issue and technique.  
V. At VITALIFY (http://www.vitalify.asia/vn/) 
1. Barcode Kanojo (is closed)  
•Description: This is iOS application. Kanojo is a girl model. The first 
user scans the product’s barcode and generates a Kanojo. This user 
can buy some gift (shirt, glasses, flower...) for this Kanojo. When the 
second user scans the barcode of the first one, he can add this Kanojo 
is a friend.  
•Team Size: 3  
•Responsibilities:  
-Working with document to code features.  
-Fix bugs occurred in coding.  
-Report to team leader.  
•Tools and Technologies: Xcode, Versions, Objective-C, ASIHTTP 
Request, Facebook API, Twitter API, JSON, Barcode.  
•Reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F_gQ9wBFBK8 
2. Love App  
•Description: This is a social network application on iOS platform. 
Through this application we can connect to another one. This 
application helps them find more friends.  
•Team Size: 3  
•Responsibilities:  
-Working with documents to code features. 
-Fix bugs occurred in coding.  
-Report project to team leader.  
•Tools and Technologies: Xcode, Cocoa Rest Client, Versions, 
Objective-C, ASIHTTPRequest, Facebook API, Twitter API, JSON. 
•Reference Link: https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/sign-sain-
byutifasshonmedia/id554606249?mt=8 
VI. At TMA (http://www.tmasolutions.com) 
1.
mVYP (mobile Visual Yellow Pages)  
•Description: Visual Yellow Pages, a mobile navigation application 
developed by TMA Mobile Solutions, in Saigon Tourist Coach in Seat 
Handbook. 
•Team Size: 4  
•Responsibilities:  
-Research solution, coding, designing, fix bugs.  
-Report project to team leader.  
•Tools and Technologies: C#, Window phone, XML, Silverlight, MVVM, 
Google map API, Json.  
•Reference: https://www.facebook.com/tmamobilesolutions/photos/a.
673456059337810/673456062671143/?type=3&theater 
VII. At University (https://en.hcmus.edu.vn) 
1. Mass-mailing (Part time)  
•Description:  
Now it is used at https://www.ascolotus.com/en/index.htm  
•Team Size: 1 

•Responsibilities: Research solution, coding, designing, fix bugs.  
•Tools and Technologies: C#, WPF, SQL, Elastic mail API.  
2. Virtual Teacher. (Thesis - get 9.5 marks)  
•Description: It gets the idea from https://www.rosettastone.com.  
•Team Size: 2. 
•Responsibilities: Research solution, coding, designing, fix bugs.  
•Tools and Technologies: C#, WPF, XML.  
Working progress : 
2011 – 2012: Window phone Developer at TMA Solution. 
2012 – 2013:  iOS developer at Vitalify Asia. 
2013 – 2014: Contractor Developer for Direct TV AT&T (FPT client).
2014 - 2015: Senior iOS Developer at Synova Solution. 
2015 - 2019: Senior Mobile Developer at Sugar Ventures. 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
